mapper.select: SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_answer_status, i.inquiry_status, i.created_at AS inquiry_created_at, i.updated_at AS inquiry_updated_at, i.member_id AS inquiry_member_id, ia.inquiry_answer_id, ia.inquiry_answer_content , ia.created_at AS answer_created_at, ia.updated_at AS answer_updated_at, ia.member_id AS answer_member_id FROM inquiry i LEFT OUTER JOIN inquiry_answer ia ON i.inquiry_id = ia.inquiry_id WHERE i.inquiry_status = false;

SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_answer_status, i.inquiry_status, i.created_at AS inquiry_created_at, i.updated_at AS inquiry_updated_at, i.member_id AS inquiry_member_id, ia.inquiry_answer_id, ia.inquiry_answer_content , ia.created_at AS answer_created_at, ia.updated_at AS answer_updated_at, ia.member_id AS answer_member_id FROM inquiry i LEFT OUTER JOIN inquiry_answer ia ON i.inquiry_id = ia.inquiry_id WHERE i.inquiry_status = false AND i.inquiry_id = #{inquiryId};

SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_answer_status, i.inquiry_status, i.created_at AS inquiry_created_at, i.updated_at AS inquiry_updated_at, i.member_id AS inquiry_member_id, ia.inquiry_answer_id, ia.inquiry_answer_content , ia.created_at AS answer_created_at, ia.updated_at AS answer_updated_at, ia.member_id AS answer_member_id FROM inquiry i LEFT OUTER JOIN inquiry_answer ia ON i.inquiry_id = ia.inquiry_id WHERE i.inquiry_status = false AND i.inquiry_answer_status = true;

SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_answer_status, i.inquiry_status, i.created_at AS inquiry_created_at, i.updated_at AS inquiry_updated_at, i.member_id AS inquiry_member_id, ia.inquiry_answer_id, ia.inquiry_answer_content , ia.created_at AS answer_created_at, ia.updated_at AS answer_updated_at, ia.member_id AS answer_member_id FROM inquiry i LEFT OUTER JOIN inquiry_answer ia ON i.inquiry_id = ia.inquiry_id WHERE i.inquiry_status = false AND i.inquiry_answer_status = false;

SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_answer_status, i.inquiry_status, i.created_at AS inquiry_created_at, i.updated_at AS inquiry_updated_at, i.member_id AS inquiry_member_id, ia.inquiry_answer_id, ia.inquiry_answer_content , ia.created_at AS answer_created_at, ia.updated_at AS answer_updated_at, ia.member_id AS answer_member_id FROM inquiry i LEFT OUTER JOIN inquiry_answer ia ON i.inquiry_id = ia.inquiry_id WHERE i.inquiry_status = false AND i.member_id = #{memberId};

SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_answer_status, i.inquiry_status, i.created_at AS inquiry_created_at, i.updated_at AS inquiry_updated_at, i.member_id AS inquiry_member_id, ia.inquiry_answer_id, ia.inquiry_answer_content, ia.created_at AS answer_created_at, ia.updated_at AS answer_updated_at, ia.member_id AS answer_member_id FROM inquiry i LEFT OUTER JOIN inquiry_answer ia ON i.inquiry_id = ia.inquiry_id WHERE i.inquiry_status = false AND ia.member_id = #{memberId};

SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_answer_status, i.inquiry_status, i.created_at AS inquiry_created_at, i.updated_at AS inquiry_updated_at, i.member_id AS inquiry_member_id, ia.inquiry_answer_id, ia.inquiry_answer_content, ia.created_at AS answer_created_at, ia.updated_at AS answer_updated_at, ia.member_id AS answer_member_id FROM inquiry i LEFT OUTER JOIN inquiry_answer ia ON i.inquiry_id = ia.inquiry_id WHERE i.inquiry_status = false AND ( i.inquiry_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR i.inquiry_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') );
